title: A Systematic Review of Security Vulnerabilities in Smart Home Devices and Mitigation Techniques
summary: Smart homes that integrate Internet of Things (IoT) devices face increasing cybersecurity risks, posing significant challenges to these environments. The study explores security threats in smart homes ecosystems, categorizing them into vulnerabilities at the network layer, device level, and those from cloud-based and AI-driven systems.
